name: Heroes Forces
description:
Heroes Forces is a small adventure with strong RPG elements such as Crafting, Talents, Leveling, Dungeoning, Class changes and a Market.

How long is this RPG?
The game should last between 2 and 4 hours if you are already experienced with RPGs.

Does it have a nice story?
No it doesn`t! I would prefer watching a movie instead then playing a story game.
Heroes forces is about grinding levels and Dungeons. Unlocking new Gears, new mechanics, and progressing with low effort.

Why would i play this game?
This game is about relax and play. Thats it you do repeatable content and is rewarded every time.
This game works as a stress reliefer. and not as an "Adventureee!"


The price is too high?
Think about it how much would you pay for cinema? for a 2 hours movies?
Wouldnt you also be entertained in a 2 hours game for only $10?

Features


  • Dungeons
  • Leveling
  • Gearing
  • Trading
  • Class Changes
  • Crafting
  • Talents

Heroes Forces is an alternative to SuperGrind RPG, as SuperGrind RPG was made for even lazier people! =)

Gatekeeper


Teleports you to the Dungeons.

Death Knight Class


Play as a Death Knight.
